p: Commercial samples of winter savory ( Satureja montana L.) (Batch 0054366), peppermint ( Mentha piperita L.) (Batch 0058567), and anise ( Pimpinella anisum L.) (Batch 0059857) essential oils supplied by Guinama (Valencia, Spain) were stored at 4 Â°C until chemical analysis and phytotoxic assays.
